drinks.name: IPA
drinks.description: An India Pale Ale with hoppy and citrusy flavors.

drinks.name: Stout
drinks.description: A rich, dark beer with notes of chocolate and coffee.

drinks.name: Wheat Beer
drinks.description: A light and refreshing beer with hints of citrus and coriander.

drinks.name: Pale Ale
drinks.description: A balanced beer with a hoppy aroma and caramel malt flavors.

drinks.name: Lager
drinks.description: A crisp and clean beer with a mild malt flavor.

drinks.name: Amber Ale
drinks.description: An ale with a rich amber color and toasty malt notes.

drinks.name: Pilsner
drinks.description: A light-bodied beer with a slightly bitter and hoppy taste.

drinks.name: Saison
drinks.description: A farmhouse-style ale with fruity and spicy flavors.

drinks.name: Scotch Whisky
drinks.description: A traditional Scottish whisky with rich smoky and peaty flavors.

drinks.name: Bourbon
drinks.description: An American whiskey with a sweet and full-bodied profile, often aged in charred oak barrels.

drinks.name: Irish Whiskey
drinks.description: A smooth and light-bodied whiskey with notes of honey and vanilla.

drinks.name: Rye Whiskey
drinks.description: A whiskey made primarily from rye grain, known for its spicy and robust flavor profile.

drinks.name: Japanese Whisky
drinks.description: A whisky produced in Japan, often characterized by a balance of delicate and complex flavors.

drinks.name: Single Malt Whisky
drinks.description: A whisky made from malted barley in a single distillery, showcasing the unique characteristics of that distillery's style.

drinks.name: London Dry Gin
drinks.description: A classic and juniper-forward gin with a crisp and dry taste.

drinks.name: Citrus Gin
drinks.description: A gin infused with bright citrus flavors, providing a refreshing and zesty profile.

drinks.name: Herbal Gin
drinks.description: A gin infused with aromatic herbs and botanicals, creating a complex and herbaceous character.

drinks.name: Sloe Gin
drinks.description: A gin flavored with sloe berries, offering a fruity and slightly sweet taste.

drinks.name: Virgin Mojito
drinks.description: A refreshing blend of lime, mint, and soda water.

drinks.name: Strawberry Lemonade
drinks.description: Tangy lemonade with a burst of sweet strawberries.

drinks.name: Pina Colada
drinks.description: A tropical blend of pineapple, coconut cream, and ice.

drinks.name: Mango Lassi
drinks.description: A creamy yogurt-based drink with fresh mango and a hint of cardamom.

drinks.name: Iced Coffee
drinks.description: Chilled coffee with milk, sweetened to perfection.

drinks.name: Sparkling Water
drinks.description: Bubbly and refreshing mineral water with a hint of natural flavor.

drinks.name: Hibiscus Iced Tea
drinks.description: Iced tea infused with hibiscus petals, creating a vibrant and floral drink.

drinks.name: Cucumber Mint Cooler
drinks.description: A cooling blend of cucumber, mint, and lime, perfect for hot summer days.

drinks.name: Ginger Beer
drinks.description: A zesty and spicy non-alcoholic beverage with a kick of ginger.

drinks.name: Watermelon Agua Fresca
drinks.description: A refreshing watermelon-based drink with a hint of lime and a touch of sweetness.

drinks.name: Cabernet Sauvignon
drinks.description: A full-bodied red wine with rich flavors of dark fruit and notes of oak.

drinks.name: Chardonnay
drinks.description: A medium to full-bodied white wine with buttery flavors and hints of tropical fruit.

drinks.name: Pinot Noir
drinks.description: A light to medium-bodied red wine with delicate flavors of red berries and earthy undertones.

drinks.name: Sauvignon Blanc
drinks.description: A crisp and refreshing white wine with vibrant citrus and herbal notes.

drinks.name: Merlot
drinks.description: A smooth and medium-bodied red wine with flavors of plum, cherry, and chocolate.

drinks.name: Kairos
drinks.description: A boutique wine from Dalmatia, Croatia. Kairos showcases the character of the region, with a focus on indigenous grape varieties like Plavac Mali.

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.description: A classic cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and agave syrup.

drinks.name: Old Fashioned
drinks.description: A timeless cocktail made with bourbon, sugar, and bitters.

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
drinks.description: A vodka-based cocktail with cranberry juice, orange liqueur, and a splash of lime.

drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.description: A refreshing mix of rum, lime juice, sugar, mint leaves, and soda water.

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.description: A classic Italian cocktail made with gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.

drinks.name: Pi√±a Colada
drinks.description: A tropical blend of rum, pineapple juice, coconut cream, and ice.

drinks.name: Manhattan
drinks.description: A sophisticated cocktail made with whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters.

drinks.name: Daiquiri
drinks.description: A refreshing blend of rum, lime juice, and sugar, served chilled.

drinks.name: Screwdriver
drinks.description: A simple yet satisfying mix of vodka and orange juice.

drinks.name: Gin and Tonic
drinks.description: A classic combination of gin, tonic water, and a squeeze of lime.

drinks.name: Whiskey Sour
drinks.description: A bourbon-based cocktail with lemon juice and a touch of sweetness.

drinks.name: Sangria
drinks.description: A fruity and refreshing mix of red wine, fruit juices, and sliced fruits.
